How To Read This DocumentÂ¶

This mapping document is designed to be read in conjunction with the Marine Community Profile 2.0 manual . Please read that document for a description of the MCP 2.0 elements and codelists and the associated ISO standards documents for a description of ISO 19115-1 elements and codelists. Refer to this document to see how each of the MCP 2.0 elements, codelist extensions and codelists defined in the MCP 2.0 Manual are mapped to ISO 19115-1 elements and codelists.
